title: The top Steam Deck games for January 2024 have been revealed - Palworld hits 2nd place
description: Valve has released the latest most-played list for Steam Deck for January 2024 and as expected, Palworld has managed to jump right near the top.

title: Steam Deck SteamOS 3.5.14 Preview - Persona 3 Reload improvements and more
description: Valve has released SteamOS 3.5.14 Preview for Steam Deck, which comes with performance improvements for the new Persona 3 Reload amongst other things.
